Discovering the Needs of Your OnlyFans Subscribers: Tips and Tricks for Attracting More Fans

Discovering the Needs of Your OnlyFans Subscribers: Tips and Tricks for Attracting More Fans

Once you establish your OnlyFans account, different types of audiences will start streaming in.

Becoming an OnlyFans model – A Step-by-step guide to follow

We get asked this question all the time about how to become a model on OnlyFans. OnlyFans modeling has been a thing right from the site’s inception, and partly due to the rapid decline in sugary arrangements, content creators are now looking to the platform to earn a decent living as models.

If you’re asking if that’s a thing, then the staggering monthly earnings of Top OnlyFans models like Black Chyna and Bella Thorne should give you a rethink.

These are all top models on OnlyFans who have set a high benchmark for aspiring models and creators alike. But how did they become models? And how can you become a successful OnlyFans model as well? 

This article aims to reveal a step-by-step guide to starting and thriving in your journey as an OnlyFans model.

Make an appointment now

How to become a model on OnlyFans

1. You’ve got to start somewhere

One thing you will find relative with OnlyFans, is gaining a ton of subscribers. This is because the number of subscribers you have subscribed to your content may determine how much money you earn as a model on OnlyFans. One mistake most newbies make when starting out is moving to OnlyFans and expecting to earn big out of the blue.

It’s almost impossible to start out as a new model on OnlyFans and expect a myriad of followers just by waving a magic wand; it has to come from somewhere! OnlyFans is swarmed by over 1.5 million creators who do the same thing as you, so it will be difficult to sell your content ideas if you’re a total newbie with no prior social presence on any platform.

Most successful models on OnlyFans already have a decent following on other platforms. This way, it is easier to make the transition. So, before stepping out into the field of content creation on OnlyFans as a model, you should first create a presence on social media platforms and build up a following, or else you may find it difficult to get your first few subscribers.

Gaining your first few subscribers can be difficult. Let us help you grow your subscriber base fast with proven steps and experience utilized by top models on OnlyFans. Apply now to get started.

2. Create an account

The first step you need to take to become a model on OnlyFans is to set up a creator account on the platform. Creating an account on OnlyFans is pretty much a piece of cake, and just like most platforms, it’s totally free and secure to get started on. 

You can choose to set up a paid subscription account or a free subscription account. A paid subscription account basically lets you charge a price for viewing your content. On the other hand, a free account is free to access by followers which means you cannot earn through paid subscriptions. However, you can earn through other ways such as PPV messages, Tips, etc.

3. Set up your account for payment

Setting up your means of payment is essential as you will need a medium to receive money for your work.

Once the account creation process is completed, you should head on to have your newly created OnlyFan model account activated. To do this, you will have to complete a verification process that will require your I.D and banking details. Once this step is completed, your new account is now set up to start receiving payment.

4. Put up an outstanding profile

For every model on OnlyFans, having a unique profile is pretty much your selling point. An appealing profile is key to gaining more subscribers and exposure.

 

Remember, people are drawn by what they see and will definitely lose interest if what they see doesn’t appeal to them.

 

So, starting out as a model, you need to set up a profile that will speak your content and sell YOU. To that end, you need a profile page that will appeal to potential subscribers, as your profile page is the first impression of your work people see when they click on your link or visit your page.

 

A few facets you can recruit for this purpose on your OnlyFans profile are your profile photo, cover image, Username, and Bio.

 

  • A profile photo is the first photo that appears above your banner image; it is smaller in size. It would be best if you used this medium to wow your audience with your best work.

 

  • A cover photo, also known as a Banner image on OnlyFans, is basically the larger image behind your profile image. You also want to make sure your best work is showcased here in high quality. So ensure the dimensions are perfect and the image used compliments your work perfectly.

 

  • Username: pick a simple and unique username that will be displayed on your profile. Try as much as possible to be short about it and maintain simplicity. Finally, you can include subtle hints of your niche here to let potential subscribers know what you’re all about.

 

  • Bio: This is also one of the essential parts of a model’s profile. Your bio carries every piece of information about you and what you’re offering on your page. You should know that only a few sentences will be visible to people who click on your page. Hence, it would help if you tried to be short and straight to the point about the things you’re offering and also basic information about yourself.

5. Set your subscription price

We generally recommend a paid subscription account for models just starting out on OnlyFans, as it is one of the most popular ways of making money on OnlyFans. Also, it will allow you to charge a price for your work. 

Subscription prices of OnlyFans range from $4.99 to 49.99. However, setting up your subscription price is just another hurdle you will have to overcome as a model on OnlyFans owing to the fact that it can be difficult to moderate the perfect price that’s going to reel in subscribers. 

We generally recommend conducting a little survey by checking out other models in your niche and seeing what price they offer for their content. You can then replicate these prices and moderate them to perfection.

Make an appointment now

6. Create a content schedule

Becoming an OnlyFans model is never an easy task. The stress and pressure can get real, from planning your content to developing content ideas. This is why we recommend a content schedule for every model. It’s basically a plan that spells out what you’re going to be doing on your page in a clear and concise manner. Of course, your content ideas can come in here as well. But most importantly, your content schedule should include how often you intend to post and what you’re going to post every other day. 

It’s one of the essential steps to tick off if you want to become a model on OnlyFans. A content schedule will ensure you’re organized and on time with content.

7. Start making content

Now you’ve got your account set up, you need to start making content. No one’s really going to subscribe to your page if there’s nothing to see. So you need to put up a few content for a start to get your potential subscribers interested in what you’re offering. This includes explicit photos, video content, written posts, etc.

If you’re lost of content ideas, you can check out content ideas for models on OnlyFans to get your started. 

8. Retain your subscribers

It’s one thing to gain subscribers on OnlyFans, and it’s another thing to keep them subscribing to your content always. For this reason, you need to produce quality and exciting content consistently. Additionally, you should aim for quality over quantity. This means that, as a model who aims to provide content consistently, you need to ensure your content is of the best quality with a high resolution. 

9. Do what models do. Wow your audience

One thing we’ve noticed from top models is their ability to make people gawk at their work. It’s just what models do; they make you drool through teasing and explicit content. You want to ensure that every piece of content you dish out wows your audience.

10. You’re a model, not a pop artist

Becoming a model starts with your actions and activities. This will very much apply to everything you post, create, or get involved in. Remember, you’re a model, not a pop artist. Your posts should strike a model appeal to subscribers. Always provide varieties when dropping content teasers; try out different angles and surroundings as well as entertain your audience.

11. Promote your OnlyFans

Do you want to hit that top 1% creator rating? Then, you need to start promoting! Promotions aim to sell you to potential subscribers and increase your earnings as well. Reddit, TikTok, Instagram, and Twitter, are all great places to start promoting on the go.

Posting content teasers and promoting your profile on other platforms is a great way to bag new subscribers. Chances are that if they dig your activities on those other platforms, they’ll be curious to check out your OnlyFans profile and possibly subscribe.

For platforms such as Reddit, you can Include your link in a pinned post on your profile; this way, people can follow this link to your page.

Note, you should pay close attention to most of these platforms as they strictly comply with rules against non-sexually explicit content. Instagram is one such platform. Hence, posting such content here can get you suspended or shadowbanned. Be sure to read the terms of use for each platform before promoting.

Extra tips

Create a custom introductory Video

When people come to your page, they instantly want to see everything about you in less time if possible, and there’s no better way to do this than with a custom introductory video. All you have to do is create one high-quality video that gives potential subscribers a peek at what you’re about and explains what they should expect from you if they subscribe. This is a total no-brainer. Ensure to pin this to the top of your OnlyFans Page.

Post consistently

One piece of advice we give to people who want to become a model on OnlyFans is to post consistently. Remember, you’re just starting out and probably have no audience or an audience that trusts you enough to subscribe in the long run. For this reason, you will have to keep up with regular posts, engage your audience more often, and constantly produce high-quality content.

Promote like a pro

Promoting is one trick top models have mastered on OnlyFans. They pretty much understand the rules for most social media platforms and know when to promote as well as when not to. If you must become a model on OnlyFans, you must learn to master the art of promoting your OnlyFans. A little trick you can use is to direct potential subscribers to a site that has all your links, this way, you can have your social media links and OnlyFans link in here. A good way to do this is by using Linktree.

Hire an agency to help you out

As we have said earlier, it’s never an easy task to become a model on OnlyFans. More so, it can be difficult to grow your subscribers as a newbie and build an actual reputation which is why most models on OnlyFans opt to hire OnlyFans agencies. If you intend to become a model on OnlyFans turn, Fandafia can help you. Apply now to get started and gain a myriad of knowledge regarding OnlyFan modeling. We can help you grow your subscribers in no time and get you to that top model status you desire. 

In conclusion

OnlyFans modeling can be fun and rewarding if you know your way around. The steps to becoming a model on OnlyFans are easy to follow but will require your patience and a lot of work to build a reputation, grow your audience and earn big. However, once you can scale these processes, you’re well on your way to becoming the next top model on OnlyFans.
